scripts.nixdev: cp views/index.html public/index.html && NODE_ENV=development webpack && webpack-dev-server --content-base public/ --hot --inline --devtool inline-source-map --history-api-fallback
scripts.windev: cp views/index.html public/index.html && set NODE_ENV=development webpack && webpack-dev-server --content-base public/ --hot --inline --devtool inline-source-map --history-api-fallback
scripts.publish: webpack && git add -A . && git commit -m "Progress" && git push
